data.name: login_link_will_be_sent_to_email
data.value: 비밀번호 재설정 링크가 귀하의 이메일로 전송됩니다:

data.name: main_page_first_lesson_is_free
data.value: 첫 레슨은 언제나 무료입니다. 전체 이용 권한을 원하시면 로그인하거나 가입하십시오.

data.name: parent_check_reports_etc
data.value: 보고서, 도움말, 언어 변경, 가입 등

data.name: purchase_info_line_1
data.value: • 구매 확정시 iTunes 계정으로 요금이 부과됩니다

data.name: purchase_info_line_2
data.value: • 현재 기간의 종료 최소 24시간 전에 자동갱신이 해제되지 않는 한 구독은 자동으로 갱신됩니다

data.name: purchase_info_line_3
data.value: • 현재 기간의 종료 24시간 이내에 계정에 갱신 비용이 부과되고 갱신 비용이 확인됩니다

data.name: purchase_info_line_4
data.value: • 구독은 사용자가 관리할 수 있으며, 구매 후 사용자의 계정 설정에서 자동 갱신을 해제할 수 있습니다

data.name: purchase_info_line_5
data.value: • 무료 시험판 사용 기간 중의 미사용 부분은 사용자의 해당 구독 가입시 소멸합니다

data.name: purchase_sorry_restoring_subscriptions
data.value: 죄송합니다, 지금 구독 정보를 복원하고 있습니다. 다시 구매를 시도해주세요!

data.name: new_version_text
data.value: 이 어플리케이션의 새로운 버전이 사용 가능합니다. 지금 업데이트 하시겠습니까?

data.name: dino_descr_0
data.value: Hi, my name is {0}. I love to read books and swim with my brothers and sisters in the ocean. My favorite color is orange and my favorite number is 7.

data.name: dino_descr_1
data.value: Hi, my name is {0}. I am a really fast runner and I swim underwater alot. My favorite color is yellow and my favorite number is 6.

data.name: dino_descr_10
data.value: My name is {0} and I like big warm hugs. What is your name? I am 5 years old in May.

data.name: dino_descr_100
data.value: My name is {0} and I am a baby. My old house is a yellow egg. I am growing every day and my egg is too small now.

data.name: dino_descr_101
data.value: Hi everyone, my name is {0} and I have lots of toes. I keep them nice and shiny.

data.name: dino_descr_102
data.value: My name is {0} and I usually like to eat my dinner outside when the weather is warm. I like to play with my friends in the park and sunny days.

data.name: dino_descr_103
data.value: Hi, my name is {0} and I am very good at painting water color paintings. I like to paint rainbows.

data.name: dino_descr_104
data.value: My name is {0} and I am very tiny for my age. Many of my friends are faller but I am a fast runner.

data.name: dino_descr_105
data.value: I am {0} and I go to the dentist once every six months. I like to brush my teeth after every meal to keep them white and shiny.

data.name: dino_descr_106
data.value: My name is {0} and I am very strong. Sometimes I lift large trees and carry them to the stream.

data.name: dino_descr_107
data.value: My name is {0} and I like lots and lots of different flowers because I like colors so much.

data.name: dino_descr_108
data.value: My name is {0} and cold weather is my favorite. I play in the snow and slide on the ice.

data.name: dino_descr_109
data.value: My name is {0}. What is your name? I come from a very large family. I have five brothers and two sisters.

data.name: dino_descr_11
data.value: Hi, my name is {0}. I love to drink lemonade that I make with my Mommy. My favorite color is yellow and my favorite number is 3.

data.name: dino_descr_110
data.value: I am {0} and I go to the dentist once every six months. My teeth are very important! Do you know why? I brush my teeth after every meal to keep them white and shiny. I wash my hands often too.

data.name: dino_descr_111
data.value: My name is {0} and I color happy dinosaur. I am learning how to swim and can float on my back. I only swim when a responsible adult is with me.

data.name: dino_descr_112
data.value: My name is {0} and my favorite ice cream flavor is strawberry. I also like mangos and eat bananas every day for my breakfast.

data.name: dino_descr_113
data.value: My name is {0} but my nick name is Daffodil because I am yellow like a daffodil flower. What is your name?

data.name: dino_descr_114
data.value: My name is {0} and I am a very happy dinosaur. I go to my gymnastics class every Thursday.

data.name: dino_descr_115
data.value: My name is {0} and my favorite hobby is sailing. I have a very nice boat and I call it ‘ Sea Banjo’.

data.name: dino_descr_116
data.value: My name is {0} and I eat apples with soft chocolate. My Mam packs me a nice snake when I go to the park with my friends.

data.name: dino_descr_117
data.value: My name is {0} and I live in the desert in a cave and its very cosy and warm. I love counting and singing.

data.name: dino_descr_118
data.value: My name is {0} and I love to play hide and seek in the jungle with my friends. I am a master at finding my friends.

data.name: dino_descr_119
data.value: I am {0} and I am the youngest member of my family. My brothers and sisters take turns to give me big warm hugs and read me stories at night.

data.name: dino_descr_12
data.value: My name is {0} and my favorite ice cream flavor is strawberry. I also like mangos and eat bananas every day for my breakfast.

data.name: dino_descr_120
data.value: I am {0} and I can write my name backwards. I am right handed. What hand do you write with?

data.name: dino_descr_121
data.value: My name is {0} and I am a baby dinosaur. I am growing big and strong. What age are you?

data.name: dino_descr_122
data.value: My name is {0} and I come from a small village called Rapterville. My school has lots of kids in it.

data.name: dino_descr_123
data.value: My name is {0} and I go to the gym and run in the park. I play soccer, basketball and cross country running. I am an athlete. What about you?

data.name: dino_descr_124
data.value: {0} I am and I am really small for my age. My Mom says I will get bigger soon if I keep eating my vegetables. Do you eat veggies?

data.name: dino_descr_125
data.value: My name is {0} and I am a dinosaur. I live in the jungle with lots of bushes and trees. There is a big lake by my cave that I call my swimming pool.

data.name: dino_descr_126
data.value: My name is {0} but my friends call me Nati. I jump and dance to the music I play on my Daddy’s phone.

data.name: dino_descr_127
data.value: {0} My name is {0} and I like to stay up at night and sleep during the day. I like the darkness best.

data.name: dino_descr_128
data.value: My name is {0} and I am so happy today because its my birthday. I am having a party and my friends and me will eat alot of cake.

data.name: dino_descr_129
data.value: My name is {0} and my friends call me Tiny. I am very popular with my friends because I tell a lot of funny jokes.

data.name: dino_descr_13
data.value: My name is {0} and I am a very happy dinosaur. I can see lots of stars in the sky at night. I try to count them all with my Dad sometimes.

data.name: dino_descr_130
data.value: My name is {0} but my friends call me Egger. I really like eggs alot. I eat alot of eggs during the day.

data.name: dino_descr_131
data.value: My name is {0} but my friends call me Jelly. I really like lemon jelly. What dessert do you like to eat?

data.name: dino_descr_132
data.value: I'm {0} and I like to do my chores everyday for my Mam and Dad and on a Sunday, I can buy an ice cream and an bowl of peanuts at the candy shop in town.

data.name: dino_descr_133
data.value: Hello my friends! I like to do my chores everyday for my Mam and Dad and on a Sunday, I buy ice cream when I shop with my sister in town. What about you?

data.name: dino_descr_134
data.value: I'm {0} and I love to go out with my friends during the day. I have always been energetic and lively. Sometimes I play different sport games for health and pleasure.

data.name: dino_descr_135
data.value: My name is {0} and I read story books every night before I fall asleep. Jack and the Beanstalk is my favorite.

data.name: dino_descr_136
data.value: Hi everyone! My name is {0} and I love monster trucks. I have a toy Monster Truck and it is red.

data.name: dino_descr_137
data.value: My name is {0} and some of my friends call me Tiny. I make paper birds that flay really far.

data.name: dino_descr_138
data.value: Hi there! My name is {0} and I am a very happy dinosaur, most of the time. When I feel sad or upset, I take deep breaths and count to five.

data.name: dino_descr_139
data.value: Hi, my name is {0} and my favorite food is vegetable soup. I like to eat nuts and apples for my lunch too.

data.name: dino_descr_14
data.value: Hi, my name is {0}. I like going to the movies and diving into the sea. My favorite color is green and my favorite number is 5.

data.name: dino_descr_140
data.value: Hi, my name is {0} and I live with my family. I have so many brothers and sisters that we have our own football team.
